title: Sci-Fi Whoosh & Transition Sound Effects
description: 200 Cutting Edge Sci-Fi Cinematic Whooshes, Swooshes, Pass-Bys & Transition Sound Effects!
longDescription:
Youtube Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F4OTrFS2dZU


With Sci-Fi Whooshes sound library Sound Response brings you professionally designed whoosh & transition sound effects collection for your production. Whether you're looking for the right sci-fi whoosh sounds to enhance various movements and transitions between the scenes, or transition and pass-by sounds for various sci-fi, hi-tech weapons, vehicles, and other gadgets, this sound library will provide you with powerful whoosh SFX arsenal!


Sci-Fi Whooshes sound library is the result of meticulous sound design process which included usage of both, synthetic sound sources generated with synthesizers and organic source sounds recorded with high-end recorders and microphones, in order to bring you the best-sounding fusion of both sonic worlds. With this soundpack at your disposal youâ€™ll have a powerful sci-fi audio arsenal full of cutting edge cinematic whooshes, swooshes, transitions, fly-by and pass-by sound effects that will easily find a way into your production!


If you like the sound of Sci-Fi Whooshes be sure to check out Whooshes & Transitions, Thriller Whooshes, and Thriller Risers sound libraries as well!


Sci-Fi Whooshes Sound Effects List
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 200

Number of Audio Cues: 200

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 13.10 min
